location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas White, Paymaster General, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter concerns vouchers required for the years 1807-1808. Includes transcripts of Bruce's own letters to White (24 February 1810, 31 December 1811, 31 March 1811, 1 July 1811, and 28 July 1811) regarding bills of exchange. Also includes a list of vouchers received from Bushire during 1807-1808.
